pr_title: JENA-1937: SHACL Compact Syntax writer and jena-shacl clean-up.

timeline.author: kinow

replies.bodyText: Good catch. It should not be there but the routines that create an IndentedWriter should have a "flush". IndentedWriter has it's own buffering for chars to bytes. The builtin IndentedWriter.stdout or IndentedWriter.stderr have setFlushOnNewline (c.f. PrintStream autoFlush).
replies.author: afs

timeline.author: kinow
